timeline.bodyText: You can use responseObject.getKey().equals(query.getSearchValue()) (drop the static ciString)
timeline.author: eshryane

replies.bodyText: I have to add equals ignore case then, as cistring as our own implementation of equals, wont it be best if we use that?
replies.author: maggarwal13

replies.bodyText: responseObject.getKey() is already a CIString, and it overrides equals() to perform an insensitive match on a String. So it's unnecessary to also convert the searchValue to a CIString.
replies.author: eshryane

replies.bodyText: Ah, I missed the point, Thanks :)
replies.author: maggarwal13
